comment._content: Benjamin Franklin Tracy (April 26, 1830 – August 6, 1915) was a United States political figure who served as Secretary of the Navy from 1889 through 1893, during the administration of U.S. President Benjamin Harrison. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benjamin_Franklin_Tracy

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The funeral was on 8/9/15. Here is the NY Times account: select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F70B1EFF385B1773... These are probably the sailors from the Brooklyn Navy Yard described in the article, not Marines.
